channel.title: Airsoft experiences
channel.description: Well i just came back from my FIRST ever airsoft games! I played like 10 games, using the mp5, i forgot to wear gloves one round and got hit between the fingers and my pinky, it was bleedin between my fingers, but it was rlly fun, post ur first experiences in airsoft wars :D

item.title: Airsoft experiences
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:20, topic:378555”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=474424.msg3469116#msg3469116 date=1295154648]
I always snipe with my bolt action. I don’t now which one I have exactly but its in one of my videos.
[/quote]
That’s awesome I always wanted a sniper more than anything.[/quote]
I haz well l96, it works good

@abat trust me you feel it…, and if you dont call yourself out, then your a dousche, because its a game of honor.

item.title: Airsoft experiences
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:15, topic:378555”][quote author=Liquid Magic link=topic=474424.msg3469185#msg3469185 date=1295158450]
My friend shot one at the dead center of my left eye. I couldn’t see straight for a week or so. Despite that, airsoft is fun and simulating.
[/quote]
inb4 glasses lulz, i wear teh full face mask, and a hood for the back of my head, why? Because there are too many 8 year olds (no joke) that will shoot you at 10 ft instead of just saying “surrender” simultaneously shoot you in the head, which is why you need to wear tons of protection.

@Krack, subbed

How i got a epic welt between my fingers.

I rushed into the game, this game was terminator type, the only game that wasnt force on force (tdm), 4 terminators are chosen, they can only walk, and they can never get out, everyone else has to run around, and shoot them, when they get shot, they are out, if anyone survives when 5 minutes is done, then the humans win.

So i forgot my gloves, and conveniently, he shoots my hand (pinky and RIGHT between my middle finger and index finger) left hand, but its my fault i forgot gloves lulz, but its still so god damn fun.[/quote]
But I am one crazy mother fucker.

Read full topic

item.title: Airsoft experiences
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Liquid Magic:

My friend shot one at the dead center of my left eye. I couldn’t see straight for a week or so. Despite that, airsoft is fun and simulating.

inb4 glasses lulz, i wear teh full face mask, and a hood for the back of my head, why? Because there are too many 8 year olds (no joke) that will shoot you at 10 ft instead of just saying “surrender” simultaneously shoot you in the head, which is why you need to wear tons of protection.

@Krack, subbed

How i got a epic welt between my fingers.

I rushed into the game, this game was terminator type, the only game that wasnt force on force (tdm), 4 terminators are chosen, they can only walk, and they can never get out, everyone else has to run around, and shoot them, when they get shot, they are out, if anyone survives when 5 minutes is done, then the humans win.

So i forgot my gloves, and conveniently, he shoots my hand (pinky and RIGHT between my middle finger and index finger) left hand, but its my fault i forgot gloves lulz, but its still so god damn fun.

Read full topic

item.title: Airsoft experiences
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Airsoft is fun.

At my old house we had a 3 way airsoft fight, we went through 2 10k containers… They hid inside and shot from a window so I hid behind our neighbors kids play house thing and just shot out of that, I won…

item.title: Airsoft experiences
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

I’ve played a bunch of times.

Best time was when I tried using a shotgun. I was playing with a bunch of friends, and my friend was trying to shoot at me from like 40m away, but I had coverage behind a hill. His gun makes a distinct sound when it runs out of ammo, and the second I heard the noise, I popped up from the hill, charged his ass,and nailed him from a foot away. Kicked ass.

Read full topic

item.title: Airsoft experiences
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

airsoft in the cold = hell, it hurts ALOT but my place was indoors, so the cold doesnt affect it to much, but we were playing a like 30 on 30 i only got 1 guy, but from like 60 ft away.

Read full topic

item.title: Airsoft experiences
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

Ahh airsoft =)

I think my first “war” was 3-4 years ago at a state park in my town. Not sure if that was legal or what but oh well. It was winter so about 8 of us got all geared up, split into teams, and just went crazy for like an hour. No rules or anything. I ended up getting shot like three times in the ear from like 10 feet away (and when it’s cold that stings like shit), but overall it was loads of fun. And we were all poor as shit so we just had a bunch of crappy ass pistols and cheap shotguns.

Read full topic
